mods.abstract: Handwritten letter thanks Sue and prosecution team for \consideration shown\ and updates on travels.

titleInfo.title: Of Monkeys and Men: Public and Private Views from the Scopes Trial

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Created and edited in general conformance to MODS Guidelines (Version 3.5).

location.physicalLocation: University of Tennessee, Knoxville. Special Collections

mods.note: Written on stationery from Chattanooga hotel. Creator appears to be on familiar terms with Sue. First and middle initials are signed W.A. but the last is unclear.
mods.accessCondition: The copyright interests in this item remain with the creator. For more information contact Special Collections at special@utk.edu.
mods.note: Friday AM\nDear SueI left Dayton before Court adjourned Wednesday - and now desire to thank you for the consideration shown me Express my thanks to HE Gen McKenzie, Judge McK and to Mr Haggard for making it possible for me to enjoy the day You gentlemen are ably handling the \Wise Men of the East\Bully for Stewart and the BryansVery sincerelyW.A. [illegible]
